error.description: The error message if the request was unsuccessful

error_code.description: The error code if the request was unsuccessful

features.description: The features the user has access to in the organization, e.g. policy-and-procedure-module, compliance-module

items.description: The features the user has access to in the organization, e.g. policy-and-procedure-module, compliance-module

organization_id.description: The ID of the organization the user has features in

success.description: Whether or not the request was successful or not
